headline.main: NAZIS HURLED BACK ON CENTRAL FRONT; Moscow Claims 'Major Victory' in Hand-to-Hand Battle in Unspecified Area LINES HOLD, GERMANS SAY Report Foe at Their Main Line In Crimea -- Berlin Also Tells of Gap Near Big City

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 30 (AP) -- The Russian Army has hurled German troops back from an unspecified sector of the central front after many hours of hand-to-hand fighting, the Moscow radio announced tonight. The Red Army scored a "major victory" in this engagement, the broadcast said.
abstract: USSR tank unit claims toll of Axis tanks and troops, Kalinin front
